"Chapter 6: Rise of the Resurgent ARKS II"

"Faria continues her story. Zephetto was one of the Resurgent ARKS advocates. He was concerned about mankind's loss of military power and weakened Photon aptitude. He gathered people to begin a project of reviving the power of ARKS, the greatest warriors of the war one thousand years ago."
